setting.location: Magnificent garden of ducal palace, Aragon, Spain

characters.appearance: Thin knight, late 40s, overwhelmed with joy and pride
characters.clothing: Armor polished to shine, new plume in helmet, clean red sash
characters.position: Kneeling before elaborate throne in garden
characters.action: Head bowed in reverence, hand on heart

characters.clothing: Elaborate court dress, jeweled chain of office, plumed hat
characters.position: Seated on temporary throne under canopy
characters.action: Extending hand graciously while exchanging knowing looks with duchess
Fan hiding smile, eyes dancing with mischief

characters.appearance: Stocky squire, early 40s, suspicious but hopeful
characters.clothing: New clothes provided by duke, still ill-fitting
characters.position: Standing behind knight, hat in hands
characters.action: Looking around at luxury with wide eyes

scene.mainElements: Noble couple entertaining themselves by playing into knight's delusions, elaborate staged reception in garden, servants in costume watching, cruelty disguised as kindness, no text or letters visible
scene.details: Manicured gardens with fountains and topiary, servants dressed as medieval pages, musicians playing period music, banquet tables being prepared, hunting dogs lounging nearby, peacocks strutting on lawn, marble statues of knights, silk banners fluttering, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Ducal palace rising majestically, mountains in distance, formal gardens extending to horizon
scene.atmosphere: Mockery disguised as honor, elaborate joke at expense of sincere belief, wealth amusing itself with poverty's dreams, bittersweet triumph for knight who finally finds recognition, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Wide formal shot emphasizing grandeur and ceremony
composition.depth: Foreground shows kneeling knight and watching squire, middle ground captures enthroned nobles, background reveals palace splendor

colorPalette.usageNotes: Black lines on white background only
